IDS.name: SDN
IDS.documentation: Description of the Synchronous Data Network parameters and the signals on it

field.name: IDS_Properties
field.documentation: Interface Data Structure properties. This element identifies the node above as an IDS

field.name: Status_of
field.documentation: Status of this structure 'OK' if the structure was created consistently, 'PARTIAL' if not complete, 'INCONSISTENT' if complete but not guaranteed consistent

field.name: Comment_of
field.documentation: Any additional comment from the source application

field.name: Source_of
field.documentation: Where do the data for this Data Item come from

field.name: Date_of
field.documentation: Date of consistent creation of this IDS

field.name: Homogeneous_Timebase
field.documentation: 1 if the Timebase of this IDS is homogeneous. In this case, the Timebase values for this IDS are stored in ../Timebase just below the root of this IDS. Otherwise, the time values are stored in the various Timebase fields at lower levels in the tree.

field.name: Allocatable_Signals
field.documentation: Dictionary of the signal names and definitions which can be allocated to the SDN

field.name: Names
field.documentation: Names of all the allocatable signals

field.name: Ip_Normalise
field.documentation: Is this signal multiplied by Ip to generate a control variable; this usage is specific to magnetic control, but could be extended to other control loops

field.name: Allocated_Signals
field.documentation: Allocation of signal names to positions in the SDN

field.name: N_List
field.documentation: Number items in the vector of structures

field.name: List
field.documentation: List of the groups of signals used at different reading and writing points

field.name: Names
field.documentation: Names of the group of SDN signals

field.name: Indices
field.documentation: Indices into the current SDN allocated list; it must be updated when the allocated list is changed
